00096 class SC_wizard_edit {

00098 /************** Début Lignes ajoutées ***********/
00099 class tx_ligestmembrelabo_add {
00100 /************** Fin Lignes ajoutées ***********/
00101 
00102                 // Internal, static: GPvars
00103         var $P;                                         // Wizard parameters, coming from TCEforms linking to the wizard.
00104         var $doClose;                           // Boolean; if set, the window will be closed by JavaScript
00105 
00106 
00107 
00108 
00114         function init() {
00115                 $this->P = t3lib_div::_GP('P');
00116                 $this->doClose = t3lib_div::_GP('doClose');             // Used for the return URL to alt_doc.php so that we can close the window.
00117         }
00118 
00125         function main() {
00126                 $BACK_PATH='../../../../typo3/';
00127                 global $TCA;
00128 
00129                 
00130                 
00131                 
00132                 if ($this->doClose)     {
00133                         $this->closeWindow();
00134                 } else {
00135 
00136                                 // Initialize:
00137                         $table = $this->P['table'];
00138                         $field = $this->P['field'];
00139                         t3lib_div::loadTCA($table);
00140                         $config = $TCA[$table]['columns'][$field]['config'];
00141                         $fTable = $this->P['currentValue']<0 ? $config['neg_foreign_table'] : $config['foreign_table'];
00142                         
00143                         /************** Début Lignes ajoutées ***********/
00144                         $table_enregistrement = $this->P['params']['table']; // Table où sera créé l'enregistrement
00145                         $champ_enregistrement = $this->P['params']['champ']; // Champ que l'on veut préremplir
00146                         
00147                         // On créé l'enregisterment avec notre utilisateur courant
00148                         $tstamp = time();
00149                         
00150                         $insertFields = array(
00151                                 'pid' => $this->P['pid'],
00152                                 'tstamp' => $tstamp,
00153                                 'crdate' => $tstamp,
00154                                 $champ_enregistrement => $this->P['uid']
00155                         );
00156                         
00157                         
00158 
00159                         $res = $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->exec_INSERTquery($table_enregistrement, $insertFields);
00160 
00161                         // On recherche l'enregistrement que l'on vient de créer
00162                         
00163                         $select_fields = '*';
00164                         $from_table = $table_enregistrement;
00165                         $where_clause = '';
00166                         $groupBy = '';
00167                         $orderBy = 'crdate DESC';
00168                         $limit = '';
00169                         $tryMemcached = '';
00170                         
00171                         
00172                         $res = $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->exec_SELECTquery($select_fields, $from_table, $where_clause, $groupBy, $orderBy, $tryMemcached);
00173 
00174                         $row = $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->sql_fetch_assoc($res);
00175                         
00176                         // Enregistrement à éditer
00177                         $uid = 0;
00178                         $uid = intval($row['uid']);
00179 
00180                         /************** Fin Lignes ajoutées ***********/
00181                         
00182                         
00183                         // Detecting the various allowed field type setups and acting accordingly.
00184                         /*
00185                         if (is_array($config) && $config['type']=='select' && !$config['MM'] && $config['maxitems']<=1 && t3lib_div::testInt($this->P['currentValue']) && $this->P['currentValue'] && $fTable)  {       // SINGLE value:
00186  
00187                                 // Lignes d'origine
00188                                 header('Location: '.t3lib_div::locationHeaderUrl($BACK_PATH.'alt_doc.php?returnUrl='.rawurlencode('wizard_edit.php?doClose=1').'&edit['.$fTable.']['.$this->P['currentValue'].']=edit'));
00189                                 */
00190                                 
00191                                 /************** Début Lignes ajoutées ***********/
00192                         if (is_array($config) && $config['type']=='select' && !$config['MM'] && $config['maxitems']<=1 && $fTable)      {       // SINGLE value:
00193                                 header('Location: '.t3lib_div::locationHeaderUrl($BACK_PATH.'alt_doc.php?returnUrl='.rawurlencode('wizard_edit.php?doClose=1').'&edit['.$fTable.']['.$uid.']=edit'));
00194                                 /************** Fin Lignes ajoutées ***********/
00195                         
00196                         } elseif (is_array($config) && $this->P['currentSelectedValues'] && (($config['type']=='select' && $config['foreign_table']) || ($config['type']=='group' && $config['internal_type']=='db')))  {       // MULTIPLE VALUES:
00197 
00198                                         // Init settings:
00199                                 $allowedTables = $config['type']=='group' ? $config['allowed'] : $config['foreign_table'].','.$config['neg_foreign_table'];
00200                                 $prependName=1;
00201                                 $params='';
00202 
00203                                         // Selecting selected values into an array:
00204                                 $dbAnalysis = t3lib_div::makeInstance('t3lib_loadDBGroup');
00205                                 $dbAnalysis->start($this->P['currentSelectedValues'],$allowedTables);
00206                                 $value = $dbAnalysis->getValueArray($prependName);
00207 
00208                                         // Traverse that array and make parameters for alt_doc.php:
00209                                 foreach($value as $rec) {
00210                                         $recTableUidParts = t3lib_div::revExplode('_',$rec,2);
00211                                         $params.='&edit['.$recTableUidParts[0].']['.$recTableUidParts[1].']=edit';
00212                                 }
00213 
00214                                         // Redirect to alt_doc.php:
00215                                 header('Location: '.t3lib_div::locationHeaderUrl($BACK_PATH.'alt_doc.php?returnUrl='.rawurlencode('wizard_edit.php?doClose=1').$params));
00216                         
00217                         } else {
00218                                 $this->closeWindow();
00219                         }
00220                 }
00221         }
00222 
00228         function closeWindow()  {
00229                 echo '<script language="javascript" type="text/javascript">close();</script>';
00230                 exit;
00231         }
00232 }
